General.Name: Xinjiang Qingsong Building Materials and Chemicals Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Xinjiang Qingsong Building Materials and Chemicals(Group)Co,Ltd. produces and sells cement products in China. It also provides building materials, commercial concrete, and chemical products. It exports its products. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Aksu, China.
General.Address: Aksu City Forest Park, Aksu, China

1.Name: Mr. Junkai  Jiang
1.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors
